survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction and effectiveness with current in-office productivity tools and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current productivity tools provided in the office?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for ease of analysis. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current productivity tools provided in the office?

questions.question_text: Which of the following productivity tools do you use daily? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unlisted tools. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly with checkboxes.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice). Include an open-text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: Which of the following productivity tools do you use daily? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face with the current productivity tools?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text with character limit.

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face with the current productivity tools?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with the productivity tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to gauge reliability issues.

script.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with the productivity tools?

questions.question_text: Which feature would most improve your productivity?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option for unspecified features. Ensure question is clear and concise.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice) with optional open-text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which feature would most improve your productivity?

questions.question_text: How much time do you spend troubleshooting productivity tools each week?
questions.client_notes: Quantify time spent on troubleshooting to assess productivity loss.

script.question_text: How much time do you spend troubleshooting productivity tools each week?

questions.question_text: Do you feel adequately trained to use the productivity tools provided?
questions.client_notes: Assess training adequacy to identify gaps.

script.question_text: Do you feel adequately trained to use the productivity tools provided?

questions.question_text: What additional tools or features would you recommend to enhance productivity in the office?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather innovative suggestions. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text with character limit.

script.question_text: What additional tools or features would you recommend to enhance productivity in the office?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the IT support provided for productivity tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure IT support satisfaction.

script.question_text: How would you rate the IT support provided for productivity tools?

questions.question_text: Would you prefer a different set of productivity tools?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge openness to change.

script.question_text: Would you prefer a different set of productivity tools?
